<<<<<<< HEAD It gives a lowpass analog prototype Butterworth filter of nth order. ======= This is an Octave function. It designs a lowpass analog Butterworth filter of nth order. >>>>>>> 6bbb00d0f0128381ee95194cf7d008fb6504de7d
